item.description:
Hello Canadians!

Tomorrow is Canada Day and I thought it would be nice to organize an event for after the Canada Day reception that some of us are attending on the HMCS Iroqouis. While I tried my best to get everyone an invitation from the consulate I just couldn't come through :(

Since the event is ending at 6 Let's meet at the new Legal in the Seaport District. They have a great roof deck on the third floor. Peter S will be hosting but I will be there around 6:30/7. My number is 617-459-5145.

 

Happy Canada Day!

 

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We will be by the Bar

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canada Day After Party...
